title: Apple Requirements - Functionality
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user opens the app and navigates around
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app does not crash with any frequency

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user opens the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app does not have obvious bugs or issues relating to alignment or restriction usability

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user uses the application
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app performs in the way that is advertised by the developer

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user uses the application
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there are no features or hidden uses that the user should have been made aware of before installing

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user is using the application
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there should not be any references to the words "beta", "demo", "trial" or "test" in the version slated for release

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user runs the application
custom_steps_separated.expected: The application should run without issue on the three different screen types including a 2X size on iPad

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates through the app
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then there should not be an functionality that tries to fake or trick the user into doing something they are not aware they are doing

custom_steps_separated.content: When checked to verify that it is correct
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then if the data is incorrect the app will be rejected

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user tries to use the application on either a Retina or Non-Retina display
custom_steps_separated.expected: The application will work without issue and both resolutions are supported

custom_steps_separated.content: When the application is set on the homescreen
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the application icon should be the same standard size as all other app icons
